layout.singingstanza: A -- bove the waste and emp -- ti -- ness Broods the Spir -- it of God, Bring -- ing forth God's speak -- ing in us. Hey! Let there be light! And the light shines in the dark -- ness, And the dark -- ness did not o -- ver -- come. In Him was life, and the life was the light of men. Nights de -- creas -- ing, day in -- creas -- ing, Ev -- ery day His Word we're speak -- ing; Don't be dis -- cour -- aged, spir -- it re -- leas -- ing! We are the chil -- dren of God.

lyrics.stanza: Above the waste and emptiness Broods the Spirit of God, Bringing forth God's speaking in us. Hey! Let there be light!
And the light shines in the darkness, And the darkness did not overcome. In Him was life, and the life was the light of men.
Nights decreasing, day increasing, Every day His Word we're seeking; Don't be discouraged, spirit releasing! We are the children of light.
